description: One-minute skill: AI and the Skills Gap.

hook.text: A factory worker loses her job to a robot. Retraining programs offer coding bootcamps. She's 54.

discovery.text: The skills gap isn't about intelligence. It's about access, time, and financial safety nets.

twist.text: Ironically, AI tutoring tools could be the best way to retrain displaced workers.

climax.text: Countries investing in lifelong learning programs may weather AI disruption best.

punchline.text: The future belongs to those who never stop learning.
